meaningMnemonic: When your <radical>scooter</radical> has a <radical>fault</radical>, you need to get an <kanji>alternate</kanji>. Hopefully your insurance will cover it too.
readingMnemonic: The <kanji>alternate</kanji> scooter is made entirely of <reading>鉄</reading> (てつ). It's hard and cold and not very comfortable when you sit on it. That's why you chose to keep it as an alternate and not as your everyday scooter.
